name: Atramentum VR
description: Atramentum is a horror puzzle game with different locations where you have to solve tasks. In a creepy atmosphere some tricky mysteries are waiting for you....
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires HTC VIVE
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7-4820K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires HTC VIVE
